body_content.explanation: one of the positions of the body used in yoga:
examples: The downward dog is a posture or "asana" used in yoga.
In this branch of yoga, each asana is joined to the next to create a flowing series of movements.

body_content.explanation: the part of yoga that consists of holding the body in different positions:
examples: Asana (the physical practice) is only one part of yoga.
Hatha yoga includes asana (physical postures), pranayama (breath control), and deep relaxation.
